I had used to think it wouldn't be a problem if\nYukari remained a Tatarigami.%K%P
That she would do well as long as she was here with\nme. I had honestly thought she would be happier\nthat way.%K%P
\dBut after hearing all that...\d%K%P
I hadn't realized Yukari's overly-optimistic\npersonality could be a double-edged sword.%K%P
Considering the treatment she had received as a\nTatarigami, I really should have known better.%K%P
\dThings can't go on like this.\d%K%P
Besides being my wife, Yukari never talked about\nany desires related to her identity.%K%P
But I now knew that deep within, her fear and\nhatred of the Tatari still burned brightly.%K%P
I wanted to rescue her from those dark feelings.%K%P
For that, there was something I had to do.%K%P
\dNot fair, that's not what we agreed on!\d%K%P
The rotation rule we had established at the start\nwas to be suspended for a while.%K%P
\dYukari had her turn yesterday. I'm supposed to\nhang out with you today!\d%K%P
The video games and board games by Shion's side\nhad apparently been prepared for that purpose.%K%P
Her plans for today wouldn't have been boring,\nthat's for sure.%K%P
\dI'm sorry. It's only for a short while. Please?\d%K%P
\dHow long is a 'short while'? Can you be more\nspecific?\d%K%P
\dUhh, I don't have an end date in mind yet...\d%K%P
\dSo it may be end up becoming a 'long while'!\d%K%P
Having her long-awaited day snatched from her\nfilled Shion with anger and disappointment.%K%P
\dIt'll be faster if you can help us with this...\d%K%P
\dYou're in on it too, Kaede? What the heck is going\non?\d%K%P
\dAs a former Tatarigami, I just can't bear to stand\nby and do nothing to help.\d%K%P
\dIt's not like I've had an easy time as a Goddess\nof Misfortune, you know.\d%K%P
\dWe know that. Treat it as a favor to me. I'll pay\nyou back next time, promise.\d%K%P
\dPromise...? Will you even do stuff you wouldn't do\nwith me last time?\d%K%P
\dI'll do anything. What do you say, Shion?\d%K%P
\dFine, since you're so adamant about it. I'm not a\ncoldhearted monster. I'll let Yukari take today.\d%K%P
Shion finally agreed, albeit reluctantly.%K%P
Kaede had been cooperative from the start, so now\nall we had to do was find a way to resolve Yukari's\nTatarigami issues.%K%P
\dYukari! We worked things out here. You done on\nyour side?\d%K%P
\dYep, all ready!\d%K%P
\dI'm sparkly clean, fresh out of the shower, I've\nput on some cute clothes, and prepared lunch too!\d%K%P
While Kaede and I were talking to Shion, we had\nYukari pack some lunch.%K%P
Yukari and I would be going out for the afternoon,\njust the two of us.%K%P
\dHehe... A date with Akira is like a dream come\ntrue!\d%K%P
\dWe're making so much progress... I feel like I'm\nabout to burst from all my fantasizing!\d%K%P
\dIsn't it better for you to turn your fantasies\ninto reality? This is real-life, after all.\d%K%P
\dHehehe! You may be right, but everything is going\nso smoothly, I just can't help myself.\d%K%P
\dAnyway, if you're ready, we should set off.\d%K%P
\dOkay!\d%K%P
I took Yukari's hand and we started off on our\ndate.%K%P
Although we usually followed Yukari's pace, today I\nwas taking the lead to entertain her.%K%P
We walked down the farm roads holding hands.%K%P
\dMost of the new rice has been harvested.\d%K%P
\dThere's still some left over in this area, but\nyeah, it looks like more than half of it's gone.\d%K%P
\dHarvest time is such a beautiful season...\d%K%P
There was a certain elegance to golden rice stalks\nfluttering in the fall wind.%K%P
It was a little cool, but by keeping close to each\nother we could stay warm.%K%P
\dYou're holding my hand so tightly... If you like\nit so much, why don't you take it home with you?\d%K%P
\dThat's not possible.\d%K%P
\dYes... You'd have to cut it off first, after\nall...\d%K%P
\dSo how about you bring it back along with its\nowner, then?\d%K%P
She looked at me expectantly, inviting me to marvel\nat what an ingenious idea that was.%K%P
\dI'm taking you back later anyway, aren't I? You\nare my wife, you know.\d%K%P
\dOh, yes, you're right... Ahaha... I can't believe\nI forgot about that.\d%K%P
Looks like the situation was making Yukari lose her\nusual cool as well.%K%P
Her sweaty palms made that abundantly clear.%K%P
\dWhere are you taking me today?\d%K%P
\dSomewhere nice. I think we'll both enjoy it.\d%K%P
\dHmm?\d%K%P
She tilted her head to the side in confusion. She\nwas cute when she did that.%K%P
I guess my statement had been a little obscure.%K%P
\dAh, here it is.\d%K%P
On the road beside us, the bus arrived, right on\nschedule.%K%P
\dWe're taking a bus?\d%K%P
\dYup. Come on, let's go.\d%K%P
We sat down beside each other on the bus.%K%P
\dLucky us! There aren't any other passengers on\nboard.\d%K%P
There was only the driver, Yukari, and me.%K%P
We sat at the back, out of sight from the driver's\nseat.%K%P
\dNot many people get on the bus from here. Once\nwe cross the ridge and get closer to the main\nshrine, there'll be more people.\d%K%P
\d...I prefer it like this, though.\d%K%P
I wished we could be together like this forever.%K%P
That was how comfortable it felt.%K%P
\dSo we're headed for the main shrine?\d%K%P
\dNot the shrine itself, it's just...\d%K%P
\dI was thinking we needed to go somewhere farther\naway if we want to be just Akira Manase and Yukari\nAmatsu for a while.\d%K%P
For better or worse, we were both well-known in the\nneighborhood.%K%P
People recognized her as a Goddess, and me as the\nheir of Kamimori Shrine.%K%P
\dJust Akira...and me.\d%K%P
\dThat sounds nice.\d%K%P
Closer to the main shrine, we could mingle with the\ntourists and remain unnoticed.%K%P
As long as we didn't say anything to give ourselves\naway, everyone would think we were just a regular\ncouple.%K%P
\dI thought that might make you happy.\d%K%P
\dYou always say you're happy as long as you're with\nme, but I still want to do something for you.\d%K%P
\dYou're so sweet, Akira.\d%K%P
\dHow could I ever return to my former life after\ntasting this sweetness?\d%K%P
\dWho said you have to go back to that?\d%K%P
\dOur relationship will keep getting stronger.\nThat's what I want, at least.\d%K%P
\dYeah, me too...\d%K%P
\dI'd like to cultivate and strengthen this bond I\nshare with you, Akira.\d%K%P
\dWow, there's so many tourists here...\d%K%P
The path leading to the main shrine was full of\nvisitors all year round.%K%P
\dOh, right! Lunch.\d%K%P
It was just the right time for a midday meal.%K%P
The restaurants nearby were so full, people were\nlined up waiting to get inside.%K%P
\dThere's a rest spot at the shop over there. Let's\nbuy some drinks and take our lunch there.\d%K%P
\dOkay!\d%K%P
We bought drinks and found some seats.%K%P
Yukari took out the lunch she had packed.%K%P
\dTa-da! I put in extra effort since it was for a\ndate!\d%K%P
\dWhat do you think? I'll bet you've never laid eyes\non such a grand-looking lunch before.\d%K%P
\dYou're right about that...\d%K%P
The lunch was packed in a heavy, double-layered\nbox, all wrapped-up in cloth.%K%P
\dWe have rice balls, fried chicken, omelet,\noctopus-shaped sausages, boiled vegetables,\ndessert, and more!\d%K%P
\dThis is amazing. How did you prepare all this in\nthat short amount of time?\d%K%P
\dHehe! I started preparations yesterday because I\nknew we would be going out together!\d%K%P
It wasn't totally unexpected, considering what we\nhad talked about yesterday.%K%P
But I was still amazed that Yukari had managed to\ndo all this without me noticing.%K%P
\dHelp yourself to anything you want. You need to\nkeep up your strength, after all.\d%K%P
\dTo enjoy the love of three Goddesses, you'll need\nthree times the strength of a normal human.\d%K%P
\dThree times the strength seems a bit tough,\nbut I'll do my best!\d%K%P
\dI need to be strong enough to at least carry you\nover the threshold.\d%K%P
\dThat's...such a lovely proposition.\d%K%P
\dI look forward to that becoming reality. Once\nyou're strong enough, I'll ask for that\nbridal-style embrace.\d%K%P
\dI'll try to make it come true soon.\d%K%P
If she just wanted to be carried, I could do that\neven now.%K%P
But I wouldn't be able to do it gallantly.%K%P
\dWhat would you like to eat?\d%K%P
\dI'll just have whatever's left over.\d%K%P
\dThat won't do! I'm supposed to be taking care of\nyou today.\d%K%P
\dI'll pick out some stuff for you.\d%K%P
\dHere! Say aah!\d%K%P
I grabbed a piece of boiled radish and held it out\nfor Yukari.%K%P
\dHuh? Umm, you know...\d%K%P
\dCome on, hurry up!\d%K%P
*nom*%K%P
Yukari soon recovered from her initial surprise and\ntook a bite.%K%P
\dHow does it taste? Oh, I guess that's a silly\nquestion, since you made the food yourself...\d%K%P
*sob* \d...The flavor of this sublime happiness has\noverwhelmed my taste buds...\d%K%P
\dOkay, how about the chicken? It might be easier to\ntaste.\d%K%P
*munch, munch*%K%P
\dI don't know, the taste is just so...special. I\nwant to chew on it forever...\d%K%P
\dThere's a lot more, so don't forget to swallow.\d%K%P
\dRight.\d%K%P
Yukari was always taking care of me, but now our\npositions were switched.%K%P
We spent a while just enjoying feeding each other.%K%P
Although hesitant at first, Yukari soon got used to\nme feeding her and even started making requests.%K%P
\dAkira! The pear looks so juicy, doesn't it?\d%K%P
\dOh? Then let's share it.\d%K%P
\dHere you go!\d%K%P
\dYum! It's so crispy!\d%K%P
\dI'll take the rest.\d%K%P
I ate the remaining half.%K%P
It was indeed a very juicy pear. Tasty, too.%K%P
\dI-Is this what they call an indirect kiss? Wow!\d%K%P
\dHuh? We never did this before?\d%K%P
\dNever. In many ways, eating something you've\ntouched would be a whole new level of intimacy!\d%K%P
\dOkay, have some apple in return, then.\d%K%P
I bit on a slice of apple on a toothpick and gave\nYukari the other half.%K%P
\d...It would be a waste to eat this. I'll take it\nhome and take my time licking it and savoring the\ntaste.\d%K%P
\dThe substance you want would be long gone by\nthen, wouldn't it?\d%K%P
\dYou're right! Then I should have it while it's\nstill fresh!\d%K%P
She snatched the apple away in the blink of an eye.%K%P
\dOh! The taste of Akira... I'm in bliss.\d%K%P
\dYou don't taste the apple at all?\d%K%P
\dIt's apple-flavored Akira. The fruity sensation\nenhances the taste of you.\d%K%P
\dHa! My taste is strong enough to relegate the\napple to second, huh? Impressive!\d%K%P
\dNobody can beat the Akira taste. It's so good I\ncould keep licking it up until the end of time.\d%K%P
After a while we finished our food and went on to\nenjoy the sights around town together. It was\neverything a good date should be.%K%P
Even the roads I was so familiar with became\nsomething novel with Yukari by my side.%K%P
As I showed her around, the bright smile on her\nface never once waned.%K%P
On the way back we bought a couple of fortune\nslips from the main shrine.%K%P
\dYes! It says 'Very Lucky!'\d%K%P
\dMe too. We're both gonna do fine.\d%K%P
\dHehehe! Matching fortunes... It must be because of\nour marital bond!\d%K%P
It was already dark by the time we reached the bus.%K%P
Yukari and I were the only passengers on board,\njust like on there way there.%K%P
Alone together again on our way back.%K%P
\dWe're getting to the end of our fun date.\d%K%P
I felt a little sad that it had to end.%K%P
Yukari probably felt the same. She was obviously\ntrying hard to remain cheerful.%K%P
\dAkira, take a look at this.\d%K%P
She showed me her fortune slip happily.%K%P
\dIt says things will go well for me in both romance\nand marriage!\d%K%P
\dWell, that's why it's 'Very Lucky,' right? Mine's\npretty awesome too.\d%K%P
\dBlessed with a good match? Ehehe!\d%K%P
We'd had this same conversation almost 10 times\nalready.%K%P
But Yukari showed no signs of getting tired of it.\nShe kept staring at her fortune.%K%P
\dA Tatarigami being lucky is...kinda strange.\d%K%P
\dI don't think so.\d%K%P
Everyone, including Goddesses, had the right to be\nhappy.%K%P
Kaede had stopped being a Tatarigami and was now\nliving peacefully. Shion had overcame her woes as a\nGoddess of Misfortune and was even earning money.%K%P
I was sure Yukari could do the same. I wanted her\nto live a life where happiness came naturally.%K%P
\dI'd never drawn a fortune slip before.\d%K%P
\dI was so sure I'd get one of the unlucky ones.\d%K%P
\dYet it was so easy for me to get this lucky one.\d%K%P
\dIt makes me so happy I feel like I'm gonna cry...\d%K%P
Yukari gazed up at the night sky.%K%P
Maybe she really was crying.%K%P
But since these were tears of joy, I was going to\njust let her be.%K%P
\dThis was the best date ever. Thank you so much,\nAkira.\d%K%P
\dIf even a Tatarigami can be this happy, a normal\nGoddess would surely...\d%K%P
\dDon't worry, Yukari. I'll make you happy.\d%K%P
We weren't quite there yet, but...%K%P
...one day, for sure, I'd be able to make her smile\nfrom the bottom of her heart.%K%P
\dLet's head back. Everyone's waiting.\d%K%P
\dOkay.\d%K%P
The feeling of sadness had all but faded away.%K%P
It had been replaced by a yearning for our warm\nhome.%K%P
And I was sure Yukari felt the same way.%K%P
